name: Tweakers.net Dark Compact
description: Darker. Reduced lineheight, reduced white-space, smaller FPA Items. Positioned the searchbar in the red top bar.
additional_info: Now compatible with Stylish add-on for Firefox by default.. Check the code to see what I mean(!important ;-))

discussions.name: Few problems with FF 16.0.1 with Stylish (Tweakers.net Dark Compact)
